title: Update regarding LuxeBrands
story_body:
LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) reported the following updates as of 08:00 EST, March 10, 2023.

Personnel Update:
LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) announced the appointment of Emily J. Miller as Vice President of Marketing, effective March 1, 2023. Ms. Miller will be responsible for leading the company's marketing efforts.

Marketing Update:
LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) launched a new social media campaign, "LuxeLife," on February 27, 2023, aimed at increasing brand awareness among the 25-45 age demographic. The campaign will run through May 31, 2023.

ESG Update:
LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) released its 2022 Sustainability Report, detailing the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives. The report highlights LuxeBrands' efforts to reduce energy consumption and implement sustainable practices in its supply chain.

No other updates were reported by LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) as of the above-mentioned timestamp.
